<h3 id="X38030">X(38030) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(3), X(7)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6-5*(b+c)*a^5+5*(b^2+c^2)*a^4+4*(b^3+c^3)*a^3-(7*b^2+4*b*c+7*c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)^3*a+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38030) = X(1)+2*X(31657) = X(3)+2*X(5542) = X(7)+2*X(1385) = 4*X(140)-X(5223) = 4*X(142)-X(355) = X(390)-4*X(15178) = 4*X(1125)-X(5779) = 3*X(3653)-2*X(38031) = 3*X(5886)-2*X(38037) = 3*X(26446)-2*X(38126) = 3*X(38024)-X(38036) = 3*X(38024)-2*X(38041) = X(38037)-3*X(38053) = 3*X(38052)-2*X(38170) = 3*X(38054)-X(38151) = 3*X(38065)-X(38121) = 3*X(38065)-2*X(38123) = 3*X(38107)-2*X(38151) = 3*X(38111)-X(38170) = 3*X(38122)-X(38126)</b>
<p>X(38030) lies on these lines: {1,31657}, {2,38179}, {3,5542}, {7,1385}, {30,38024}, {140,5223}, {142,355}, {390,15178}, {511,38046}, {515,38054}, {516,3534}, {517,11038}, {518,10202}, {519,38065}, {527,3653}, {952,38052}, {954,10269}, {971,5886}, {1001,16203}, {1125,5779}, {1387,10384}, {2346,26285}, {2550,37727}, {2801,38108}, {2951,22791}, {3062,9624}, {3475,11227}, {3576,5762}, {3616,36996}, {3655,6173}, {4297,31671}, {4321,18443}, {5054,38130}, {5055,38158}, {5587,38171}, {5686,11231}, {5728,13373}, {5732,12699}, {5759,13624}, {5790,38204}, {5791,12005}, {5805,18481}, {5817,11230}, {5840,7675}, {5843,38028}, {5845,38029}, {5850,10165}, {5851,38032}, {5852,38033}, {5885,7672}, {5901,11372}, {6067,37438}, {7988,38139}, {8581,11374}, {9955,36991}, {10156,25568}, {10398,15325}, {10427,12737}, {11373,14100}, {11495,16202}, {12669,26201}, {14986,15008}, {15298,21154}, {19875,38175}, {24680,35514}, {25055,38043}, {28186,38137}, {28204,38149}, {28208,38073}, {30331,37624}, {38093,38154}</p>
<p>
X(38030) = midpoint of X(11038) and X(21151)<br>
X(38030) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5587, 38171), (5686, 11231), (5790, 38204), (5817, 11230), (5886, 38053), (26446, 38122), (38036, 38041), (38052, 38111), (38107, 38054), (38121, 38123), (38149, 38172)<br>
X(38030) = anticomplement of X(38179)<br>
X(38030) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (5732, 20330, 12699), (38024, 38036, 38041), (38065, 38121, 38123), (38124, 38125, 38111)<br>
</p>
